solution_line_template: Each day, mama bird needs to catch {num_babies} x {worms_per_baby_per_day} = <<{num_babies}*{worms_per_baby_per_day}={daily_worms_needed}>>{daily_worms_needed} worms.
For {num_days} days, she needs {daily_worms_needed} x {num_days} = <<{daily_worms_needed}*{num_days}={total_worms_needed}>>{total_worms_needed} worms.
With papa bird’s catch, they have {mama_worms_left} + {papa_caught} = <<{mama_worms_left}+{papa_caught}={total_worms_have}>>{total_worms_have} worms.
To feed the babies for {num_days} days, she needs to catch {total_worms_needed} - {total_worms_have} = <<{total_worms_needed}-{total_worms_have}={worms_still_needed}>>{worms_still_needed} more worms.
